property.name: content
property.value: #! /bin/sh # Failover command for streaming replication. # This script assumes that DB node 0 is primary, and 1 is standby. # # If standby goes down, do nothing. If primary goes down, create a # trigger file so that standby takes over primary node. # # Arguments: $1: failed node id. $2: new master hostname. $3: path to # trigger file. failed_node=$1 new_master=$2 trigger_file=$3 # Do nothing if standby goes down. if [ $failed_node = 1 ]; then exit 0; fi # Create the trigger file. /usr/bin/ssh -T $new_master /bin/touch $trigger_file exit 0;
